pullRequest.title: CLDR-13954 Make sure child SEED locales are included.
pullRequest.bodyText:
Checklist

 Issue filed: https://unicode-org.atlassian.net/browse/CLDR-13954
 Updated PR title and link in previous line to include Issue number

commit.message: CLDR-13954 Make sure child SEED locales are included.

nodes.bodyText:
Sets.difference(es.getRawExtraPaths(), es_US.getRawExtraPaths()) perhaps?
It's use the ordering of the first set, so maybe not ordered the same.

Maybe use an enum over a boolean here (readability).
supplementalData.getGrammarInfo(cldrFile.getLocaleID(), ALL_LOCALES)
seems to read better than:
supplementalData.getGrammarInfo(cldrFile.getLocaleID(), false)

commit.message: CLDR-13954 clean up code a bit.
